name: Sunny Apartment
details: A cozy 2-bedroom apartment with plenty of sunlight, located in downtown.

name: Luxury Villa
details: A luxurious 5-bedroom villa with a private pool and garden, located in an exclusive neighborhood.

name: Modern Loft
details: A spacious and modern loft with industrial design, located in a vibrant area with many amenities.

name: Country House
details: A charming 3-bedroom house in the countryside, perfect for those seeking tranquility and nature.

name: Beachfront Condo
details: A beautiful 2-bedroom condo with direct beach access, offering stunning sea views.

name: Penthouse Suite
details: An exclusive 4-bedroom penthouse with panoramic city views and luxury amenities.

name: Suburban Home
details: A comfortable 3-bedroom home located in a quiet suburban neighborhood, ideal for families.

name: Studio Apartment
details: A compact and affordable studio apartment, perfect for single occupants or students.

name: Mountain Cabin
details: A rustic 2-bedroom cabin in the mountains, offering stunning views and a peaceful retreat.

name: Urban Flat
details: A modern 2-bedroom flat in the heart of the city, close to shops and public transport.
